item.description:
It's the third meeting of the Saturday Chapter! We'll meet on the 30th so as not to conflict with Memorial Day.

It's fun to hang out in this interesting part of town, sip an iced latte, and talk books with other bookish people. New members are always welcome!

On the agenda is our regular book-themed schmoozing and smorgasbord of bookcrossing-registered books. (http://www.bookcrossi...) This location has free wi-fi, so if you forget to register your books or you're not sure how, you can register them on the spot. (Bringing books is optional.)

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have a pile of books on the table & a small sign with the Ballycumber logo
item.name: The Boston Bookcrossing May Meetup -- Saturday Chapter
